0.Text: Should I call you something else instead of %current_name%?

4.Text: Can you give me a nickname that's 18 or fewer?

5.Text: I think %you% wants me to call them nothing at all.

6.Text: %new_nickname%?.. %new_nickname%. Okay, %new_nickname%. I'll call you that from now on.

7.Text: Got it, %new_nickname%. I'll try my best to remember your nickname.
